imgDesc.text: After you load a Blank Score, you can activate the performance device to begin a glorious on-stage performance!

As you are performing, the stage will fire off Note Bubbles of different types.
If you can collect a certain number of Note Bubbles during this time, the performance will proceed normally.

Use the power of the "symphony" by <color=#ffe14b>Pressing to unleash a Pause Soundwave</color> and cause the Note Bubbles to stop moving, all the better for you to collect them.
While you are performing, you might encounter all sorts of unexpected situations. Find a way to conquer these challenges and complete your performance.
Once the giant ship Fortuna in the mural reaches its destination, your performance will have reached its perfect conclusion!

As the ship in the mural sails along, it will encounter storms, during which you must <color=#ffe14b>collect Note Bubbles</color> to deploy a shield and weather the lightning. If the ship is sunk before it can deploy said shield, the performance will fail as well.
During a storm, the stage will also be subject to unpredictable thunderstrikes. Find a way to avoid them and complete the performance!
